title: Demon's Souls Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.13.20
description:
Blessing and Greg dive into Demon's Souls reviews and impressions!

00:00:00 - Start
00:08:20 - Housekeeping
Today - Bugsnax Launch Party @ 11:30 AND TwitchGaming @ 1
This Friday Andy is going to stream Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War campaign with his fancy PC to show off Ray Tracing to show off his Nvidia RTX 3080 (Sponsored By Nvidia) 2-4PM Friday on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:12:40 - Demon’s Souls Review Round-Up
00:25:20 - NPD October 2020, Jeffy Grubb Grubb @ GamesBeat
00:32:42 - Respawn Refuses Crunch AGAIN, Marie Dealessandri @ GIB
00:39:10 - XIII Apologizes
**00:46:00 -  Ad  
00:48:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:50:00 -  - DoingOK
00:53:20 - Squad Up:Samson PC (but Fuser is crossplay) - Discord: Samsam#8527; Fuser: SAMSAMXL#2652 
00:57:13 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: normal week
